attributes.action: To shut the schools until the end of January for Scotland
attributes.additional_details: Close all schools in Scotland and bring back online learning until the end of January 2022 at least
attributes.background: Let puppils stay home and do online learning to help stop the spread of covid

rejection.details:
As education policy in Scotland is devolved to the Scottish Government, the UK Government cannot take the action this petition calls for. 

You could submit a petition to the Scottish Parliament asking for this action to be taken, if that is something you'd like to do. You can find out how to do this here: https://petitions.parliament.scot/.
